link.title: AOS #94 » iCal Feed

div.p:
Remote Learning Days are continuing until further notice.
All school buildings are closed to the public.
Free WiFi is available in all school parking lots.

aside.h1: ALL SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE DUE TO RECOMMENDATIONS FROM STATE AND FEDERAL HEALTH OFFICIALS (COVID-19).

aside.h2: Remote Learning Resources for Students and Families
Alyson Saunders, Winner of the President Award for Excellence in Math and Science
ALL SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE DUE TO RECOMMENDATIONS FROM STATE AND FEDERAL HEALTH OFFICIALS (COVID-19).
Remote Learning Resources for Students and Families
Lisa Quatrale, Winner of the 2019 English Teacher of Excellence Award
Andrew Shorey, 2019 Dale Curry LTC Coach of the Year

div.p: The Community is the Heart of the School... The School is the Heart of the Community – Maine School Administrative District No. 46
Preparing all students to be career and college ready.

aside.p: We are made up of the school districts Maine School Administrative District No. 46 (MSAD #46), the Harmony School Department, and the Athens Community School District. AOS #94 is a recognized Maine leader in educational practices, systems, and approaches through its commitment to personalized and rigorous instruction, shared leadership, and a focus on “students first: always.” AOS #94 is small yet globally connected through its commitment to state-of-the-art technology integration and an international learning program that brings students from all over the world into the heart of Maine to learn, connect, and grow.

h4.a: Our teachers are using E Spark remote learning apps!

div.p:
Central Office
175 Fern Road, Suite 1
Dexter, ME 04930
(207) 924-6000 ext 2

aside.p: We are Alternative Organizational Structure No. 94, or AOS #94!
We are made up of the school districts Maine School Administrative District No. 46 (MSAD #46), the Harmony School Department, and Athens Community School.
AOS #94 is made up of the towns of Dexter, Exeter, Garland, Harmony, Ripley, and Athens, Maine.
AOS #94 Title IX Coordinator is Sandra Emerson. She can be reached at 207-924-6000.
AOS #94 Affirmative Action Coordinator is Sandra Emerson. She can be reached at 207-924-6000.

p.a: Click here to access our school and district NCLB/ESEA reports.
